fieldpermissions-desc: Provides fine-grained field-level access control using permission levels or groups.
fieldpermissions-page-title-help: Optional. Links to a wiki page describing this level.
fieldpermissions-edit-denied-visibility: You do not have permission to edit Visibility levels.
fieldpermissions-edit-denied-property: You do not have permission to edit this restricted property.
fieldpermissions-edit-denied-content: You do not have permission to add visibility controls to this content.
